sub_title: Zero Trust - Secure Connectivity lead Connext Transformation program
summary:
Terry is a (Senior) Security Project manager / Programme Manager with over 25 years of experience with strong multi-level communication skills. He has a proven customer track record with Shell, for which he received several Recognition Letters and Awards running Large and international Projects. Acting in the field of Enterprise Security and Delivery Management, with focus on Zero Trust, Cloud, Datacenter and infrastructure technology, process, and practices. He holds an MBA in Business Change Management. He is a certified Managing Successful Programmes Practioner, a Prince2 and Shell Edge AGILE Practitioner, a certified PMP-Project Management Practioner, and an ITIL Service Manager.  Giving him the capability to design a best ‘fit for purpose’ management of delivery solution. He supported colleague Project Managers at Shell, as a designated Edge Agile Scrum coach.  
With his experience in the whole project lifecycle, across a range of market sectors, he can adapt to specific cultures across a variety of organizations. He has knowledge of recent technical innovations and market developments. Through his communications skills, he is capable of transforming these innovations and market developments into solutions and work packages for his customer and the business. Because of his broad experience in program and project environments, he can translate these propositions into project goals accompanied by Program, Project and Agile Delivery plans. By using his managerial capabilities he can ensure reaching the defined project goals and deliver them on time and within budget. He is pragmatic, analytical, flexible and a team worker.

- Certified Information Security Manager (trained)
- Certified Information Systems Security Professional
- Microsoft Azure
- Palo Alto Networks Certified -    
   Cybersecurity Associate
- MBA Change Management
- Certified Managing Successful Programs Practioner
- Certified PMI-PMP practioner; 
- Certified Prince 2 (Agile) Practioner; 
- What's Possible: Salesforce Fundamentals
- Salesforce Administrator
- Certified Cloud Technology Associate
- Certified Shell Edge Agile Practioner
- Edge Agile Scrum coach for Shell Project Managers
- Agile Scrum Master
- Safe 4.5 Agilist
- Shell (Be Agile) Project Delivery Framework; 
- Certified ITIL Service Manager.

contributors.headline: Zero Trust - Secure Connectivity lead Connext Transformation program
Director & Co-Owner Spencer William BV - SharePoint, Teams, M365 & Azure Specialist
Principal IT Consultant at CGI Nederland
Senior Service Manager in SITI B.V.
IT People Manager & Senior Program Manager

profile_positions.description: Transforming Zero Trust application access and perimeter capabilities
profile_positions.title: Workstream Lead Connext Transformation

profile_positions.description:
As part of Connext Transformation program we are enhancing the protection around our datacenters at a global level, to mitigate the risk of cyber attacks and malware spreading through Shell.  We successfully completed  the deployment across the globe. 
These changes were completed without any downtime occurring.
Portfolio feedback: ‘this is another testament to our ability to design, build and deploy complex perimeter solutions in line with one of the main ConneXt program objectives, great achievement and very proud of the team’
profile_positions.title: Zero Trust Lead - Secure Connectivity Connext Transformation

profile_positions.description:
So proud to be joining Shell and supporting the company in Powering Progress, setting out the strategy to accelerate the transition of the business to net-zero emissions, designed to create value for our shareholders, customers and wider society.  
Our digital transformation strategy requires an increasingly flexible, agile and secure IT environment in order to enable best use of data, cloud services, personalization of user experience and connectivity of devices. Keeping our business goals and user experience in the forefront, Shell IT has taken the decision to insource or directly procure a number of connectivity services. By taking greater control over key aspects of connectivity we can provide our users with better user experience, speed and agility, while maintaining operational effectiveness and efficiency. As a result, we are building a partially insourced and multi-vendor ecosystem for our connectivity products and services and will be developing new skills and capabilities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Projectmanager Security

profile_positions.description: Project Manager in the Shell Enterprise Service portfolio, working on implementing the connectivity strategy for Shell with a Program to enable improved Threat Prevention. Working with Cyber Defense to deliver enforced protection
profile_positions.title: Shell Enterprise Services Portfolio -  Project Manager Agile

profile_positions.description: Digital Transformation Program to achieve an unrivaled customer experience, unlocking customer value through a deep understanding of customer needs and customer centricity.  Scoped on a prioritized timeline as part of the Pensylvania Chemicals Program-Shell Polymers- and its Pre Marketing Go Live end 2018. Deploying a fit for purpose solution for all Chemicals businesses and product lines with full GSAP integration.  The program re-labeled to 4C: Chemicals Customers Curiosity Cloud is on a journey to integrate many of Shells current systems (360/Customer Relationship Management, Emptoris/Sales & Contract Management and the Customer Portal) in one single platform, with the objective to create a much better user experience for colleagues & customers, create more transparency and insights across Shells business and transform the way Shell collaborates and coordinates around their customers. The successful completion off this project is an important milestone on that journey. The project team received recognition from the GM Intermediates Europe/Africa and the VP Business Readiness IT Evolution for the major milestones and successful Go Lives achieved; and delivering the business functionality to the PE and Solvents business with the GSAP integration in place. Key success factor lay in supporting each other across role boundaries, and being available across time zones, putting in effort in evening or weekends. In an almost relentless pursuit of success whilst always keeping the business and end users experience in sight
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Salesforce CRM/360  for Shell Polymers and Chemicals Liquids

profile_positions.description:
He has had business evolution responsibility with a team of 15 members (SI&C) where he was responsible and accountable for:
•	Bid Management (Oil and Gas - Subsurface and Wells-application cloud migration; Transport 
        and Logistics - Security Concepts deployment)
•	Service Delivery with focus on Digital Transformation and cloud migrations
•	Customer Relationship Management 
•	Team and Member Management
•	Operations Management – Leading and managing to achieve targeted revenue and profitability
Terry completed FY 2016 for CGI as a ‘Top quartile’ performer, with his results belonging to the best in his sector. Through his contracts and Projects based on his targeted revenue, the billable allocation of his resource team and his realized margins together with his measured customer satisfaction. 
Since January 2017 he is focusing on his delivery role as a  (Senior) Project Manager and Programme Manager
profile_positions.title: Project Delivery Program Director Consulting Services

profile_positions.description: Terry worked as an IT Project manager and Project Management Team Lead for CGI.  With more than 25 years of experience and a focus on the business domain Oil and Gas. His technology domains with his areas of expertise are in Enterprise Information Management with the collaboration tool Sharepoint, Cyber Security including Process Control Domain security, Customer Relationship Management  with Salesforce and large and complex IT infrastructures. As a Teamlead he was responsible for leading and managing a team of 16 (Senior) projectmanagers and project management officers, in order to develop the CGI Project Management Practice and to meet the profitability target as set for the Unit. He maintains strong business relations between the account and CGI at all levels required and also facilitates CGI bids with providing input from his domains such as Shell's 'Foundation for Value' where CGI have been successfully chosen as the ‘Partner of Choice’ to work with Shell to harvest value from their Enterprise Information Management SharePoint environment.
profile_positions.title: Project Director-Teamlead Project Management

profile_positions.description:
Shell delivers a very large part of its business via Non Operated Joint Ventures 
•	Shell’s key contribution to JVs is its technical capability. JVs require access to this capability in-order to operate and deliver bottom line to Shell via Shell’s shareholding.
The recommended way forward was to initiate an activity (covering people, process and technology) to improve the way  P&T interacts with its external partners.
Terry was contracted to bring a first Pre-release of a cloud solution based on SharePoint on the backend and a Salesforce solution on the front-end. Terry received a recommendation on the efforts he made to bring the project under control in anticipation of its first release in January 2016 before handover to Shell
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Salesforce SCC Customer Connnect

profile_positions.description:
He worked on the Shell and CGI PCD IT security Global Deployment Programme for Downstream Manufacturing, Upstream and DS Global Commercial.
The program is designed to realize the following primary outcomes:
Improve Organizational Maturity & Capability: Establish the organizational foundations across the PCD operations lifecycle (Buy, Deploy and Run) and to enable the effective management of cyber risk at a specific location. Terry provided input to the Call Off agreement for CGI as a supplyer in this program. He showed CGI's capabilities in this area with developing and setting up a list of CGI candidates and resources for this programme. Based on the Kick-off workshop with Shell at the Shell technology Center  in Amsterdam he hosted several workshops for CGI across the Netherlands to train resources on the PCD security basics.
profile_positions.title: PCD IT Security Deployment Lead

profile_positions.description:
As part of a companywide initiative, Shell wanted to use SharePoint as a platform for document management, collaboration and applications. Based on his success in his previous role as Project Manager in Managing Information for P&T, Terry was selected to replace the Project Manager to help Shell Downstream migrate their existing information systems on to SharePoint to address both the opportunities and challenges associated with information and data. As a Project Manager he was responsible for:
•	moving Shell Downstream businesses to a new SharePoint environment. 
•	liaising with various COB IT and business staff to create plans regarding the COB business SharePoint migrations from LiveLink to SharePoint 2010. 
•	identifying and engaging with leaders in planning meetings 
•	preparing migration plans and work packages based on the standard SharePoint journey maps
•	liaising with the SharePoint Programme resources and a central bulk migration factory
He Received a Shell Special Recognition Letter/award for a top 20% Team Performance in this Programme completing the migrations on time and on budget.
profile_positions.title: IT Project Manager Downstream  Business SharePoint Migration

profile_positions.description:
Shell’s data and documents have increased exponentially, outpacing our ability to effectively manage information and costs. SharePoint had been chosen as the strategic choice for Shell’s Information Management backbone to replace the end-of-life Livelink systems and the SharePoint 2007 environments. For the Division P&T (Projects and Technology). Terry was the Project Manager responsible for setting up project work streams in line with Shell PDF(Project Delivery Framework) and mapping to Shell’s Central Managing Information Programme with tasks to:
•	manage the overall Project plan and schedule and ensuring the project ran according to timelines, within budget and without disrupting business continuity 
•	create and manage the Project Control Plan and Stage Gates review and sign-off
•	report to the Decision Review Board and business stakeholders at Shell VP level
•	support the work stream leads to prioritize items and balance workload
•	Monitor and track benefits
From September 2012 to July 2013 he was accountable in ensuring P&T deleted/migrated all its 327 SharePoint sites to the latest version. With a Strong focus on Capital Projects migrations and ensuring Business Continuity. The MI4PT SharePoint migrations were delivered on target, within budget and a measured customer expectation rating of ‘Exceeding expectations’.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Managing Information for P&T

profile_positions.description:
Under the umbrella of the digital transformation with the aspect of Cybersecurity, the PCD (Process control domain) security program was set up to address the PCD Security. Based on his success in his previous role on implementing the TD Compliance security standard for Shell Global LPG, Terry was hired as the Regional Project Manager for Downstream Manufacturing Europe responsible for the fixed date, fixed price Programme for the eight European Refineries and Chemical sites in Shell Downstream Manufacturing. 	  
The project, with a budget of 14M$ was delivered successfully within budget and target deadline, for which Terry received a Platinum award: "Reason: creating winning teams, with the way you built project teams in eight Shell Refineries and Chemical sites and helping the people to show their capabilities is of very high standards" .
profile_positions.title: Regional Projectmanager DS Manufacturing Europe implementation PCD security

profile_positions.description:
From 2005 to 2008 working for Shell Oil Products Downstream and LPG in a Global Security Trust Domain program and steering international project team leaders in Europe and Asia; 
Responsible for Project Managing the implementation of the organization, procedures, controls and technology for the TD/ISS security standard and certification for the operating units in Benelux, France, Germany, UK, Nordics, Greece, Turkey, Spain, Portugal, Italy, Hungary, Romania, Pakistan and Sri Lanka.
profile_positions.title: Cluster Project Manager TD Security Compliance and enmbeding Global LPG
Project manager DS Europe Mediterranean & Refineries TD security Compliance
